column4: why does my system lag out when ever I run more than 2 apps at once? eg totom and nautalis
it shouldnt,, what is the hardware config on that system?
i7 2.6ghz, 8GB ram
what about video card    lspci | grep -i vga
nvidia NVS 3100 512MB
well certainly the hardware can handle it,,  are you in Unity or classic gnome?
gnome
install htop   run the two apps that seem to have this issues and see if anything is eating up resources at that point  via htop
not sure how to uuse that, the output is very confusing lol
for the video card  open a terminal and copy paste this command       lspci | grep -i vga
is that kernel patch thats supposed to improve system preformace included in ubuntu?
it will give a readout that you can paste here
01:00.0 VGA compatible controller: nVidia Corporation GT218 [NVS 3100M] (rev a2)
ok and  have you already installed the nvidia driver from   System / Administration / Additional Drivers ...yes?
no, i removed them. They wouldent let me configure Dual Screens properly. Using nouveau
but the problem was there with nvidia drivers too
oh! mm surprising   then I am puzzled for sure
for instance if I spin my cursor around on the screen continuously it will regularly freeze for a second as well as the video in totom etc
ubuntu 10.10 btw
ok I am going to have to break here,, but there are many here with far more skills than I ,,, so try again,, i will be back later
kk, thnkx
